name: ACTIVITY
title: ACTIVITY
description: Defines a single activity within an Instruction, such as a medication administration.

element.short: Defines a single activity within an Instruction, such as a medication administration.
element.definition: Defines a single activity within an Instruction, such as a medication administration.

constraint.human: Action archetype id valid must not be empty

element.short: Timing of the activity, in the form of a parsable string.
element.definition:
Timing of the activity, in the form of a parsable string. If used, the preferred syntax is ISO8601 'R' format, but other formats may be used including HL7 GTS.

May be omitted if:

* timing is represented structurally in the `_description_` attribute (e.g. via archetyped elements), or
* unavailable, e.g. imported legacy data; in such cases, the `INSTRUCTION._narrative_` should carry text that indicates the timing of its `_activities_`.

element.short: Perl-compliant regular expression pattern, enclosed in  '//' delimiters, indicating the valid identifiers of archetypes for Actions corresponding to this Activity specification.
element.definition:
Perl-compliant regular expression pattern, enclosed in  '//' delimiters, indicating the valid identifiers of archetypes for Actions corresponding to this Activity specification. 

Defaults to  `/.*/`, meaning any archetype.

element.short: Description of the activity, in the form of an archetyped structure.
element.definition: Description of the activity, in the form of an archetyped structure.
